intro.intro: How I embarked on this journey
intro.storyPart1: After suffering an injury last year that left me with two broken legs, I decided to use my recovery time to explore a new field: front-end development.
intro.storyPart2: With the encouragement and support of a dear friend and my passion for problem-solving, I quickly found front-end development to be a captivating and enjoyable challenge, approaching each problem as a fun and exciting puzzle.
intro.storyPart3: As I have completed my self-taught training, I am eager to start working in this fascinating field. I am thrilled to be able to combine my creativity with my technical skills to bring innovative solutions to my employers.
intro.quote: ¬´ The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty. ¬ª
intro.picture: A photo portrait of Winston Churchill with a hat. He's smoking his famous cigar.
